# requirements for running the tests via pytest
pytest>=2.9
pytest-pythonpath>=0.7.1
pytest-cov>=2.5.1
pytest-xdist>=1.22.0
# latest pip version of pytest-django is more than a year old and does not support Django 2.0

datadiff==2.0.0
